title: Flappy Alert Report
description: Schema for reporting and analyzing flappy/noisy alerts detected in monitoring systems.

monitor_name.description: Exact name of the monitoring alert as it appears in the monitoring system. Must not be fabricated.

condition.description: Actual condition that triggers the alert. Must be based on real monitoring configuration, not assumed.

trigger_value.description: Actual numeric threshold that triggers the alert. Must be from real monitoring data.

recovery_value.description: Actual numeric threshold for alert recovery. Must be from real monitoring configuration.

alert_links.description: Valid URLs to actual alert instances or monitoring dashboards. All links must be verified and accessible.

flap_reason.description: Factual analysis of why the alert is flapping based on observable data and patterns. Must avoid speculation and focus on verifiable causes.

impact.description: Measurable impact of the flappy alert on systems and teams. Must be based on actual metrics or documented incidents, not assumptions.

recommendations.description: Actionable recommendations based on analysis. Each recommendation must be specific, implementable, and directly related to the flapping issue.

next_actions.description: Concrete next steps with clear ownership and timelines. Must be realistic and achievable actions, not vague suggestions.

feedback_mechanism.description: Specific method for providing feedback on this report. Must include actual contact information or system references, not generic placeholders.
